amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 116-79 to add a monthly reporting requirement that CFPB provide Congress with the number of investigations opened and closed relating to potential fair lending violations, how many fair lending enforcement actions taken or referred, analysis of consumer complaints relating to potential fair lending violations, and stats on how many Office of Fair Lending and Equal Opportunity staff are dedicated to supervision and enforcement.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lawson (FL) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lawson (FL) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Lawson (FL).
